component.name: Quixel Bridge
component.summary: The perfect Bridge between Megascans and your favorite tools

description.p: With its custom import, channel packing, and automated export features, Bridge allows you to manage your assets in one place like never before. The days of manual shader setup, image conversion or sensitive folder structures are over; welcome to the future of asset management.
NOTE: This wrapper is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by Quixel.
